CommandDefinition.Name: listschedulerinfo
CommandDefinition.Description: Shows detailed information about the state of the Xyna Scheduler.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows all order ids currently residing in the scheduler

BoolOption.Name: vv
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows all order ids currently residing in the scheduler, temporarily locking the scheduler to get consistent information
